Label: LOC_Os01g58390
Comment: This is homologous to Yeast gene entry YHR100C from Uniprot P38812 (GEP4_YEAST). The sequence identity is about 33%, but was the  best hit and has HAD-SF_ppase_IIIA domain. Arabidopsis homolog is AT3G58830.

Label: cardiolinin synthase
Comment: Cardiolipin synthase. Arabidopsis homolog is AT4G04870 (CLS)
